Plot: Princess Irene's discovery of a secret stair leads to a wonderful revelation. At the same time, Curdie overhears a fiendish plot by the goblins. Princess Irene & Curdie must make sense of their separate knowledge & foil the goblins' schemes.
Characters: Princess Irene, Curdie Peterson, Lootie the nursemaid, Prince Harelip, Goblin Queen
